I am with thee. The Lord makes five statements directly to us, Israel, to quiet our fear and dismay: I am with thee, I am thy God, I will strengthen thee, I will help thee, I will uphold thee. This verse is echoed in the comforting Latter-day Saint hymn "How Firm a Foundation."

right hand of my righteousness. The Lord upholds us with his right hand, his covenant hand.
